property.name: mapreduce.jobtracker.address
property.description: The host and port that the MapReduce job tracker runsat. If "local", then jobs are run in-process as a single mapand reduce task.

property.name: mapreduce.jobhistory.webapp.address
property.description: MapReduce JobHistory Server Web UI host:port

property.name: mapreduce.map.memory.mb
property.description: Default ammount of memory allocated in YARN for map tasks.

property.name: mapreduce.reduce.memory.mb
property.description: Default ammount of memory allocated in YARN for reduce tasks.

property.name: yarn.app.mapreduce.am.resource.mb
property.description: Default ammount of memory allocated in YARN for MapReduce AppMasters.

property.name: mapreduce.map.java.opts
property.description: Arguments to java invocations of map tasks by the NodeManager. Most commonly used to configure heap sizes. The following symbol, if present, will be interpolated: @taskid@ is replaced by current TaskID. Any other occurrences of '@' will go unchanged. For example, to enable verbose gc logging to a file named for the taskid in /tmp and to set the heap maximum to be a gigabyte, pass a 'value' of: '-Xmx1024m -verbose:gc -Xloggc:/tmp/@taskid@.gc'. Usage of '-Djava.library.path' can cause programs to no longer function if hadoop native libraries are used. These values should instead be set as part of LD_LIBRARY_PATH in the map / reduce JVM env using the mapreduce.map.env and mapreduce.reduce.env config settings.

property.name: mapreduce.reduce.java.opts
property.description: Arguments to java invocations of reduce tasks by the NodeManager. Most commonly used to configure heap sizes. For more details see mapreduce.reduce.java.opts.

property.name: yarn.app.mapreduce.am.command-opts
property.description: Arguments to java invocations of MapReduce AppMasters. Most commonly used to configure heap sizes. For more details see mapreduce.reduce.java.opts.

property.name: mapreduce.map.cpu.vcores
property.description: The number of virtual cores required for each map task. Not enforced by default.

property.name: mapreduce.reduce.cpu.vcores
property.description: The number of virtual cores required for each reduce task. Not enforced by default.

property.name: yarn.app.mapreduce.am.resource.cpu-vcores
property.description: The number of virtual cores required for The MR AppMaster. Not enforced by default.

property.name: mapreduce.job.maps
property.description: The default number of map tasks per job. Ignored when mapred.job.tracker is "local".

property.name: mapreduce.job.reduces
property.description: The default number of reduce tasks per job. Typically set to 99%of the cluster's reduce capacity, so that if a node fails the reduces can still be executed in a single wave. Ignored when mapred.job.tracker is "local".

property.name: mapreduce.tasktracker.map.tasks.maximum
property.description: Property from MapReduce version 1 still used for TeraGen sharding.

property.name: mapred.local.dir
property.description: Directories on the local machine in which to store mapreduce temp files.
